body_html: RDMA for open source TF is an issue that's starting to get some attention from the TF team, though I can't yet predict timing for a solution. gRPC is not likely to be extended in the necessary way, and the internal system referred to in the cited paper is not suitable for open sourcing. Presumably if you are interested in this problem, you're already using a cluster with GPUs and RDMA capable networking. If so, would you mind saying what kind of rpc/networking you're using on that cluster?
